item.description:
This is a reminder memo.

We have been here before and always had a great time.

Weather permitting, I hope that we can sit out side
at the patio viewing Stonebridge Restaurant and
The direction of the Train Station.

Parking is kind of hard.
I usually park over by the Milford Green and walk over.

Wish you luck if you are going to try to park closer.

http://www.cafeatlant...

www.cafeatlantique.us/

There will be great coffee and delicious food.

Thank you!

I hope to see you there!

Many of you have not been to an event for months.

Mike B.
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes and Maybe.
item.name: Coffee Talk goes back to Cafe Atlantique on April 11
